segments.text: I'm staring at this kitchen, and suddenly I realize the sink is overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is just gushing out; I didn't expect that at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman hasn't noticed yet, which shocks me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, looking left, there's a boy on a stool—wait, is that tipping?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies, and the girl's helping; what a sneaky duo.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet's open wide, cookies spilling almost.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is so neutral while chaos brews.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a serene garden, totally contrasting inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't see the puddle growing until now—it's huge!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed; this could go wrong fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The plate in her hand looks perfectly dry, ironically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Who knew a simple kitchen could hold so many surprises?
segments.speaker: PAR
